user_objective: The personal assistant leverages FaissRAGWorker for retrieval augmented generation, RequestWorker for API calls and requests, MessageWorker for managing conversations, SearchWorker for web queries, SchedulerWorker for scheduling tasks, and MessageWorker for fallback operations.
builder_objective: The personal assistant orchestrates voice interactions, web search, api requests, and conversational AI to help with everyday tasks such as ordering rides, setting reminders, sending messages, and initiating phone calls.
intro: RYAA (Real-Time Yielding Autonomous Assistant) for Senior Project II is developed by top computer science seniors. It integrates advanced voice interaction, conversational AI, and web search capabilities via specialized workers to assist with daily operations.

rag_docs.desc: Description of RYAA (Real-Time Yielding Autonomous Assistant)
